Translations.Text: He procreated not nor was He procreated
and there be not anything comparable with Him
Say: I take refuge with the Lord of Daybreak
from the worst of things that He created
and from the worst of the darkness of the night when the dark intensified
and from the worst of the women who practice magic, blowing on the knots
and from the worst of one who is jealous when jealous
Say: I take refuge with the Lord of humanity
from the worst of the sneaking whisperer of evil
who whispers evil in the breasts of humanity
from among the genie and humanity
